alert.note: Alert for Lowlands of the Bootheel; Southwest Desert, Lower Gila River Valley (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 19 at 2:24PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Hidalgo County through 315 PM MDT... At 222 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles northeast of Windmill, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 40 to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lordsburg, Cotton City, Animas, Road Forks, Windmill, Lordsburg Playa, Pyramid Mountains and Shakespeare. This includes Interstate 10 in New Mexico between mile markers 5 and 28. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Lowlands of the Bootheel; Southwest Desert, Lower Gila River Valley
